description:
302 - A spiritual sequel to the film 300, or the just the historical Battle of Thermoplyae

This is the first game I've ever released or even finished, and I've learnt a lot making it. I wrote a devlog for the jam, and also made videos documenting my progress, which can be seen here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcT3iGeJJfpGU1QehvG48tg

https://itch.io/t/253697/302-a-2d-rpg-sequel-to-300-for-the-awful-summer-game-ja...

There are a couple of issues with the game, with the main one being the buggy menu buttons that sometimes decide not to work for some reason

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Kick

X - Roll

C - Attack

V - Map

Esc - Pause
